title: Probability of Rolling a Sum
description: What is the probability of getting a sum of 7 when two fair dice are rolled?

title: Normalization in DBMS
description: Explain the difference between 3NF and BCNF with a suitable example.

title: Prime Number Generation Filter
description: Write a function to return all prime numbers up to n using the Sieve of Eratosthenes.

title: Virtual Memory Management
description: What is thrashing in the context of virtual memory? How can it be prevented?

title: Work and Time
description: A can complete a task in 10 days, and B can do it in 15 days. If they work together for 4 days, how much work is left?

title: Matrix Transpose
description: Implement a function to find the transpose of a given m x n matrix.
